document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Sickness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">stains </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Brave, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Dart, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Doubt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Scene </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">adjourning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Not sickness stains the brave
